revision.comment: Notification of altered sources needing review #IABot (v1.2.7)
revision.text: {{WikiProjectBannerShell|1= {{WikiProject Politics of the United Kingdom|class=start|auto=inherit|importance=}} {{WikiProject India|class=start|importance=mid|politics=yes|politics-importance=high|image-needed=yes|assess-date=May 2012}} {{WikiProject Military history|class=Start | |B-Class-1=no |B-Class-2=yes |B-Class-3=yes |B-Class-4=yes |B-Class-5=yes |British-task-force=yes |South-Asian-task-force=yes }} }} ==Untitled== 100,000 Gurkha's in Indian Army? That seems too high. What is the source for this data. --[[User:DuKot|DuKot]] 05:13, 18 August 2005 (UTC) See [http://www.globalsecurity.org/military/world/india/rgt-gorkha.htm Global Security] - as far as I can determine, there have been no appreciable cuts to the Indian Army in the last 15 years; there are certainly still over 40 battalions of Gurkhas in the infantry, and there would also certainly still be Gurkhas in the various support arms (as there are in the British Army). Given the size of the Indian Army (over 1,000,000), I think that 10% of its strength as Gurkhas is a reasonable estimate. [[User:Hammersfan|Hammersfan]] 11:10, 4 September 2005 == External links modified == Hello fellow Wikipedians, I have just modified {{plural:2|one external link|2 external links}} on [[Britain–India–Nepal Tripartite Agreement]]. Please take a moment to review [https://en.wikipedia.org/w/index.php?diff=prev&oldid=748538343 my edit]. If you have any questions, or need the bot to ignore the links, or the page altogether, please visit [[User:Cyberpower678/FaQs#InternetArchiveBot|this simple FaQ]] for additional information. I made the following changes: *Added archive https://web.archive.org/web/20050308125906/http://www.army.mod.uk:80/brigade_of_gurkhas/gurkha_employment/tpa/ to http://www.army.mod.uk/brigade_of_gurkhas/gurkha_employment/tpa/ *Added archive https://web.archive.org/web/20090114020518/http://www.army.mod.uk:80/brigade_of_gurkhas/new_gtacos.htm to http://www2.army.mod.uk/brigade_of_gurkhas/new_gtacos.htm When you have finished reviewing my changes, please set the ''checked'' parameter below to '''true''' or '''failed''' to let others know (documentation at {{tlx|Sourcecheck}}). {{sourcecheck|checked=false}} Cheers.—[[User:InternetArchiveBot|'''InternetArchiveBot''']] ([[User talk:InternetArchiveBot|Report bug]]) 18:59, 8 November 2016 (UTC)
